lyrics.japanese: 青い渚を走り 恋の季節がやってくる
lyrics.romaji: aoi nagisa wo hashiri koi no kisetsu ga yatte kuru
lyrics.english: Running on the blue shore, the season of love is coming

lyrics.japanese: 夢と希望の大空に 君が待っている
lyrics.romaji: yume to kibou no oozora ni kimi ga matte iru
lyrics.english: In the sky of dreams and hope, you are waiting

lyrics.japanese: 熱い放射にまみれ 濡れた身体にキッスして
lyrics.romaji: atsui housha ni mamire nureta karada ni kissu shite
lyrics.english: Covered in hot radiation, kissing your wet body

lyrics.japanese: 同じ波はもう来ない 逃がしたくない
lyrics.romaji: onaji nami wa mou konai nigashitakunai
lyrics.english: The same wave won't come again, I don't want to let it go

lyrics.japanese: 君を守ってやるよと 神に誓った夜なのに
lyrics.romaji: kimi wo mamotte yaru yo to kami ni chikatta yoru na no ni
lyrics.english: Even though it was the night I swore to God I'd protect you

lyrics.japanese: 弱気な性と裏腹なままに 身体疼いてる
lyrics.romaji: yowaki na sei to urahara na mama ni karada uzuite ru
lyrics.english: Contrary to my weak nature, my body aches

lyrics.japanese: だから好きだと言って
lyrics.english: So say that you love me

lyrics.japanese: 天使になって
lyrics.english: Become an angel

lyrics.japanese: そして笑って もう一度
lyrics.english: And smile, once more

lyrics.japanese: せつない胸に波音が打ちよせる
lyrics.romaji: setsunai mune ni namioto ga uchiyoseru
lyrics.english: The sound of waves crashes against my aching heart

lyrics.japanese: いつか君をさらって
lyrics.english: Someday I'll steal you away

lyrics.japanese: 彼氏になって
lyrics.english: Become your boyfriend

lyrics.japanese: 口づけあって 愛まかせ
lyrics.english: Kissing each other, leaving it to love

lyrics.japanese: 終わりなき夏の誘惑に
lyrics.romaji: owari naki natsu no yuuwaku ni
lyrics.english: In the endless temptation of summer

lyrics.japanese: 人は彷徨う 恋は陽炎
lyrics.romaji: hito wa samayou koi wa kagerou
lyrics.english: People wander, love is a mirage

lyrics.japanese: 嗚呼... 蘇る
lyrics.english: Ah... it revives

lyrics.japanese: 赤い夕陽を浴びて 風が水面に帆を立てる
lyrics.romaji: akai yuuhi wo abite kaze ga minamo ni ho wo tateru
lyrics.english: Bathed in red sunset, the wind raises sails on the water

lyrics.japanese: やがて消えゆく愛の灯に 人は追いすがる
lyrics.romaji: yagate kieyuku ai no hi ni hito wa oisugaru
lyrics.english: People chase after the light of love that will soon fade

lyrics.japanese: 「出逢い」「別れ」のたびに 二度と恋に落ちないと
lyrics.romaji: deai wakare no tabi ni nido to koi ni ochinai to
lyrics.english: With each meeting and parting, saying I'll never fall in love again

lyrics.japanese: 誓う孤独の太陽が 涙で滲む
lyrics.romaji: chikau kodoku no taiyou ga namida de nijimu
lyrics.english: The lonely sun I swear to blurs with tears

lyrics.japanese: 夢を叶えてくれよと 星に願いを込めた日も
lyrics.romaji: yume wo kanaete kure yo to hoshi ni negai wo kometa hi mo
lyrics.english: Even on the day I wished upon a star to fulfill my dreams

lyrics.japanese: 二人の海に夜明けは来ないと 君は気付いてた
lyrics.romaji: futari no umi ni yoake wa konai to kimi wa kizuiteta
lyrics.english: You realized that dawn wouldn't come to our sea

lyrics.japanese: いつも肩寄せ合って
lyrics.english: Always leaning on each other's shoulders

lyrics.japanese: 僕に触って
lyrics.english: Touch me

lyrics.japanese: 涙を拭いて もう一度
lyrics.english: Wipe away the tears, once more

lyrics.japanese: 振り向きざまに「サヨナラ」は言わないで
lyrics.romaji: furimuki zama ni sayonara wa iwanaide
lyrics.english: Don't say goodbye as you turn around

lyrics.japanese: やがて二人黙って
lyrics.english: Eventually we both fall silent

lyrics.japanese: つれなくなって
lyrics.english: Becoming cold

lyrics.japanese: 心変わって 愛は何故？
lyrics.english: Hearts change, why is love?

lyrics.japanese: 海啼く闇の真ん中で
lyrics.romaji: umi naku yami no mannaka de
lyrics.english: In the middle of the sea-crying darkness

lyrics.japanese: 月はおぼろ 遥か遠く
lyrics.english: The moon is hazy, far away

lyrics.japanese: 秋が目醒めた yeah!
lyrics.english: Autumn has awakened yeah!

lyrics.japanese: 君を守ってやるよと 神に誓った夜なのに
lyrics.romaji: kimi wo mamotte yaru yo to kami ni chikatta yoru na no ni
lyrics.english: Even though it was the night I swore to God I'd protect you

lyrics.japanese: 弱気な性と裏腹なままに 身体に疼いてる
lyrics.romaji: yowaki na sei to urahara na mama ni karada ni uzuite ru
lyrics.english: Contrary to my weak nature, my body aches

lyrics.japanese: だから好きだと言って
lyrics.english: So say that you love me

lyrics.japanese: 天使になって
lyrics.english: Become an angel

lyrics.japanese: そして笑って もう一度
lyrics.english: And smile, once more

lyrics.japanese: せつない胸に波音が打ちよせる
lyrics.romaji: setsunai mune ni namioto ga uchiyoseru
lyrics.english: The sound of waves crashes against my aching heart

lyrics.japanese: いつか君をさらって
lyrics.english: Someday I'll steal you away

lyrics.japanese: 彼氏になって
lyrics.english: Become your boyfriend

lyrics.japanese: 口づけあって 愛まかせ
lyrics.english: Kissing each other, leaving it to love

lyrics.japanese: 終わりなき夏の誘惑に
lyrics.romaji: owari naki natsu no yuuwaku ni
lyrics.english: In the endless temptation of summer

lyrics.japanese: 人は彷徨う 恋は陽炎
lyrics.romaji: hito wa samayou koi wa kagerou
lyrics.english: People wander, love is a mirage

lyrics.japanese: 嗚呼... 蘇る
lyrics.english: Ah... it revives

lyrics.japanese: 愛よ もう一度
lyrics.english: Love, once more

lyrics.japanese: 今、蘇る
lyrics.english: Now, it revives
